cards.name: The Fool

light: You have faith in the future
You are living in the moment
You are starting a new journey
shadow: You are being naive or foolish
You are failing to plan ahead
You lack a sense of purpose

cards.description: The Fool represents new beginnings, having faith in the future, being inexperienced, not knowing what to expect, having beginner's luck, improvisation and believing in the universe.

cards.name: The Magician

light: You are using your skills and resources

cards.description: The Magician is the card of manifestation, willpower, and inspired action. It suggests that you have all the tools and resources you need to achieve your goals.

cards.name: The High Priestess

shadow: You are out of touch with your inner self

cards.description: The High Priestess signifies intuition, mystery, and the subconscious mind. She encourages you to trust your inner voice and look beyond the obvious.

cards.name: The Empress

light: You seem to embrace your feminine energy
You are nurturing yourself and others
shadow: You may be feeling creative blocks

cards.description: The Empress represents femininity, nurturing, fertility, and abundance. She is the embodiment of creation and connection to the natural world.

cards.name: The Emperor

light: You are establishing order and structure
You are taking on a leadership role
shadow: You are being controlling or rigid

cards.description: The Emperor symbolizes authority, structure, and control. He brings order to chaos and represents a powerful, fatherly figure who provides stability and security.
